channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg on the stand: ‘Crazy,’ ‘scary’ ideas led him to buy Instagram and WhatsApp
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg was the leadoff witness in an antitrust case against Meta – one filed under the first term of the president he's now cozying up to.

item.title: 'Major questions doctrine': Judge orders Trump to restart climate, green energy funding

item.title: Vance sounds off on deportation, 'ratification of Biden's illegal migrant invasion' via 'fake legal process'
item.description: Vice President JD Vance declared that he and President Donald Trump will not allow "The ratification of Biden's illegal migrant invasion"

item.title: Students, ACLU sue over removal of 'woke' books from military schools

item.title: A Minecraft Movie Fights Cultural Inertia with Joy
item.description: Jared Hess’s gamer movie dreams of capitalist innovation.

item.title: Hawley urges Republicans to cut taxes for working-class voters who 'put Trump in the White House'
item.description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., says Republicans need to cut taxes for President Trump's base by applying income tax credits to the payroll tax.

item.title: Douglas Murray’s Unbearable Smugness Undermines His Own Argument On Israel And Ukraine
item.description: After a three-hour episode, he only manages to convince listeners that he's a self-absorbed clown.

item.title: Tariff Critics Have No Answer To Trump’s National Security Arguments About Chinese Manufacturing
item.description: The onus is on those whose favored policies have left us imperiled to present a better plan than Trump’s to defend America’s interests.

item.title: Senators, Don’t Fall For Hillary Clinton’s Desperate Lies About The SAVE Act
item.description: The left is peddling the myth that the SAVE Act will disenfranchise married women from voting. Nothing could be further from the truth.

item.title: Law students sue over feds requesting personal information from targeted firms

item.title: Texas poised to create its own version of DOGE as bill passes both chambers
item.description: Texas lawmakers passed a bill that would establish a new Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) following Elon Musk's federal model. The state age...

item.title: Harvard Discovers What Federal Money Costs
item.description: The Trump administration’s overreaching demands of Harvard are merely a symptom of excessive federal involvement in universities.

item.title: Biden, in first speech since leaving office, says Trump is threatening Social Security

item.title: To Save Medicaid, We Have to Cut It
item.description: Medicaid reform doesn’t mean abandoning the disadvantaged.

item.title: Why The Girlboss Space Launch Was A Giant Step Back For Womankind
item.description: This supposed great boon for feminism was actually a bust.

item.title: Free Traders Are Talking Past the Working Class
item.description: The free trade case is correct. But free traders need to frame their arguments differently.

item.title: New Englanders Know the Trump Tax Cuts Need to Be Extended
item.description: Higher taxes and fewer jobs are not a recipe for economic growth. New Englanders will get both if Congress fails to extend the TCJA.
